summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. B-157, for the improvement of Market Street, formerly East Broadway, from 11th Avenue Northwest to a point 289.05 feet west of the west margin of 15th Avenue Northwest, by constructing a sewer, under Ordinance No. 1237, of the former City of Ballard, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
